availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Gibson (Greenup County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, physician. Pennsylvania native. Married to Adaline Gibson. Father of Henry F. Gibson, Sarah K Gibson, John M. Gibson. Physician in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 780.
Find A Grave, "James L. Gibson (Unknown-1867)," Memorial #81418920, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/81418920(accessed January 12, 2020).
Records of the Internal Revenue Service, NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 15, District 4, Kentucky, 1862, (Accessed via ancestry.com on January 31, 2020).
